ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence.circular

Class Polar

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence.circular.Polar

  • public class Polar
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates polar coordinates. Should place this someplace else, but am only using it here for now.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Polar()
      Creates a Polar point with r=0, t=0.
      Polar(double radius, double theta)
      Converts the passed (x,y) coords into polar coords, and stores them in the new polar object.

                double y)
        Creates a polar point from the passed cartesian coords.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate.
        y - The y-coordinate.
        Returns:
